item.description:
Sooo This month- is at Jeff's place! Yes again, he's given us a nice home to meet at- thank you Jeff!

The theme of the month? How about- Let's not have our MeetUp on Xmas day?!

This is usually a very mellow evening of just hanging out. Because of the holidays most folks can't make it and that's ok...Enjoy and we'll be here when you get back!

For those of you who need a little photo break- come on and join us. Let's talk about how folks love getting the gift of photography - everything from Photo Cards to Calendars to Framed Prints- they make great holiday presents- why not show us what your giving this year (or in past years) to family and friends!

Happy Holidays everyone!
Donna and Scotty
item.how_to_find_us: Scott and I are always to try to greet everyone who comes to the meetups. We'll

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Worcester Photography December Meetup
